column.name: address
column.value: Moskovskaya 45/5

column.name: address
column.value: Frolikava 25/4

column.name: title
column.value: THEME_1As the capital was walking on the 'Night of Museums'. Our photo report

column.name: content
column.value: In the main museum of the country this year the theme was “the nature of the senses”. Joy, Fear, Sadness, Disgust, Anger - these are not only familiar emotions, but also characters of the Disney “Puzzle”. The program included board games, creative zones, a quest, a mudbor, where one could leave his visualized dreams, a performance from an experimental theater.

column.name: summary
column.value: In the main museum of the country this year the theme was “the nature of the senses......

column.name: theme
column.valueComputed: (SELECT t.id FROM Theme t WHERE t.name = 'THEME_1')

column.name: title
column.value: THEME_1Free 'Avengers' and cool 'Night of Museums'. Where all your friends will go on a weekend in Minsk

column.name: content
column.value: On the territory of the Upper Town in Minsk a new season of “Pedestrians” opens. The whole Saturday at one o'clock in the afternoon at the Town Hall the Minsk groups will create a sound. Who you know for sure is INTELLIGENCY (their output is at 21.30).

column.name: summary
column.value: On the territory of the Upper Town in Minsk a new season of “Pedestrians” opens.....
